Introduction
============

Colorful World is a theme originally created by: 
    Themza Team  
    http://www.themza.com  
    templates@themza.com  
    
The theme was converted into a Plone 4 theme by: 
    Chrissy Wainwright - Six Feet Up  
    http://www.sixfeetup.com  
    info@sixfeetup.com
